name: Cliche Hunter
description:
A game made in 30 days for the Game Off game jam.

Controls:
  • WASD or arrows to Move
  • Space to Jump 
  • E to Activate 
  • Left Mouse Button / Enter to attack

Fullscreen:

Use the blue Fullscreen button to enable full-screen.

Gameplay:

The game contains 25 gaming cliches to be found, some very obvious and impossible to miss, others that might require unconventional gameplay to achieve (hint: Check the achievements screen to see where you can unlock specific achievements/cliches).

Can you find all 25 gaming cliches? Only one way to find out! 

Good luck on your journey Hero!

We would love to hear your thoughts on our Jam game so don't forget to leave a comment : )
